Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0078446/","name":"Up in Smoke","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU3MTNiYjEtODQ5Yy00Y2RiLWIyMjctNGNiNmFmYTA4Y2NhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0078446/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gavin6942"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Definitive Cheech and Chong Film","reviewBody":"Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van -- made entirely of marijuana -- from Mexico to Los Angeles, with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

Although Cheech and Chong made several films together, they will probably always be best remembered for this one, their first. There are so many moments that have since become a part of pop culture. The use of War's "Low Rider", the smoking of the Labrador... when watching it for the first time you might feel like you have seen it before.

Those into drug culture may appreciate the film more, but being a stoner is certainly not required to laugh at the antics of these two luckless losers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37485,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Music"],"datePublished":"1978-09-15","keywords":"marijuana,cheech and chong,stoner comedy,vietnam war veteran,low budget film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi989577497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTY5YWRlZTUtZjI3MS00YTcwLTg4MTktNWFmYTk0YzA4NmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTY5YWRlZTUtZjI3MS00YTcwLTg4MTktNWFmYTk0YzA4NmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Although Cheech and Chong made several films together, they will probably always be best remembered for this one, their first. There are so many moments that have since become a part of pop culture. The use of War's "Low Rider", the smoking of the Labrador... when watching it for the first time you might feel like you have seen it before.

Those into drug culture may appreciate the film more, but being a stoner is certainly not required to laugh at the antics of these two luckless losers.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37485,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Music"],"datePublished":"1978-09-15","keywords":"marijuana,cheech and chong,stoner comedy,vietnam war veteran,low budget film","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi989577497","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTY5YWRlZTUtZjI3MS00YTcwLTg4MTktNWFmYTk0YzA4NmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTY5YWRlZTUtZjI3MS00YTcwLTg4MTktNWFmYTk0YzA4NmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001507/","name":"Cheech Marin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001045/","name":"Tommy Chong","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001510/","name":"Strother Martin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004693/","name":"Lou Adler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001045/","name":"Tommy Chong"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001045/","name":"Tommy Chong","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001507/","name":"Cheech Marin"],"duration":"PT1H26M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ceniza negra
Czarne popioły
Ceniza Negra
programme.desc:
Ceniza negra: Directed by Sofía Quirós. With Smashleen Gutiérrez, Humberto Samuels, Hortensia Smith, Keha Brown. Selva (13) lives in a coastal town in the Caribbean. After the sudden disappearance of her only motherly figure, she is left to take care of her grandfather who doesn't want to live. Between shadows and wild games, she must decide if she will help her grandfather die, even though that means going through her last moments of childhood alone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10219406/","name":"Ceniza negra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjZkMjMwODctMDQ3Zi00MjkxLTgwNDYtNDM0MzY2NjMyZDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MTEzMTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Selva (13) lives in a coastal town in the Caribbean. After the sudden disappearance of her only motherly figure, she is left to take care of her grandfather who doesn't want to live. Between shadows and wild games, she must decide if","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10219406/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"morrison-dylan-fan"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":""Dying is like sleeping,a deep sleep-you fall asleep forever,and never wake up."","reviewBody":"After viewing the interesting Sanctorum (2019-also reviewed),I decided to check what other titles were on the 2021 WOW Film Festival line-up. Finding that there were only a handful of tickets left for this screening/stream,I got set to enter the land of ashes.

Note:Some plot details in review.

View on the film:

Becoming the first movie from Costa Rica to be shown at Cannes, debut writer/ director Sofia Quiros & cinematographer Francisca Saez Agurto explore the land of ashes with magnetic surrealist stylisation of refined wide-shots across 13 year old Selva and her grandparents holiday home, housed in panning shots between the living and the dead.

Slithering snakes onto the screen from the opening shot as a recurring motif/ symbol for eternal cyclic renewal or a cycle of life, death, and rebirth, (in this case,via shedding its own skin) Quiros marks the disappearance of Selva's grandmother, with an increase slide into Magical Realism,via excellent panning shots across the wall on the shadow of Selva talking to the shadow spirit/ghost of her grandmother.

With the rather dream-logic, abstract sparse dialogue screenplay by Quiros exploring Selva's relationship with death, Smashleen Gutierrez gives a mesmerising turn as Selva,whose sometimes abrasive exchanges with her grandparents,is shredded by Gutierrez with a growing spiritual maturity in the land of the ashes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-03-04","keywords":"mourning,coming of age","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1581039897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5OGM5ZDYtMjJmMC00ZmI3LTkzMGEtZDNiMjE3NzcxOTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5OGM5ZDYtMjJmMC00ZmI3LTkzMGEtZDNiMjE3NzcxOTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8681763/","name":"Smashleen Gutiérrez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10636144/","name":"Humberto Samuels"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10636145/","name":"Hortensia Smith"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4942492/","name":"Sofía Quirós"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0595748/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0590792/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0743073/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4942492/","name":"Sofía Quirós"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Full Monty
Goło i wesoło
The Full Monty
programme.desc:
The Full Monty: Directed by Peter Cattaneo. With Robert Carlyle, Mark Addy, Wim Snape, Steve Huison. Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119164/","name":"The Full Monty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg0NWFjMTAtNGZjMC00NmZlLThhZDYtM2MzNTU2NDZiZDVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDUyOTUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119164/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"artistathome"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is an unbeatable movie! I saw it at the theater in 1997 along with about 7 other women...we all went to the theater alone because our hubbies refused to take us! Seriously...I did not know one single woman in the theater that day! We all loved the movie right off...

My sister bought it and we watched it with captioning, and boy had we missed a lot of lines at the theater and funny ones at that! You see with the English accents and all their slang-- you just can't understand a lot of what they are saying...

Watch this movie with and without the captioning! It's like watching a movie with English being your second language, and I B.S. you not!

The English working class has a different way of expressing themselves--its so charming and hilarious...

I think Robert Carlysle is brilliant "Gaz". I cannot think of anyone who could have done it better. 

This movie cannot be beat! I bought it and recommend it to everyone!! Definitely a ten out of ten."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":102446,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-08-29","keywords":"steel worker,unemployment,male stripper,northern england,dole","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Full Monty","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi395116825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001015/","name":"Robert Carlyle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146341/","name":"Peter Cattaneo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065001/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Curse of La Llorona
Płacząca kobieta
La Llorona
programme.desc:
The Curse of La Llorona: Directed by Michael Chaves. With Linda Cardellini, Roman Christou, Jaynee-Lynne Kinchen, Raymond Cruz. Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother suspected of child endangerment, a social worker and her own small kids are soon drawn into a frightening supernatural realm." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4913966/","name":"The Curse of La Llorona","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU4NjU4ZDktOTg2Ny00MWI2LThiMTAtMGFkZGE1MWI5MzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODQxMTI4MjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother suspected of child endangerment, a social worker and her own small kids are soon drawn into a frightening supernatural realm.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4913966/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Golden_Hope"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very Generic","reviewBody":"This movies soul purpose is to get teenagers into the cinema in the summer. It is a cash grab.

It's super basic. It is like a Mad Lib horror movie. Like "lady goes to church to see priest to learn about ______" "sound should drop out and then _____ should appear behind main character". It's really paint by numbers. Like you could fill them sentences in with so many different horror movie 'monsters/ghosts'.

I really like Linda Cardellini, she was fine in this nothing great.

I don't know if you were board with friends you could put this on but I'd just watch something better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":44942,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-04-19","keywords":"ghost,spin off,folklore,social worker,widow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3663903257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjYwZTJiYTktM2E0NC00ZjJjLWFmYmYtYjZmM2ZlOTdjNzI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjYwZTJiYTktM2E0NC00ZjJjLWFmYmYtYjZmM2ZlOTdjNzI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother suspected of child endangerment, a social worker and her own children are drawn into a frightening supernatural realm."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004802/","name":"Linda Cardellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190441/","name":"Raymond Cruz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0892383/","name":"Patricia Velasquez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980431/","name":"Michael Chaves"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5657522/","name":"Mikki Daughtry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3037068/","name":"Tobias Iaconis"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

It's really paint by numbers. Like you could fill them sentences in with so many different horror movie 'monsters/ghosts'.

I really like Linda Cardellini, she was fine in this nothing great.

I don't know if you were board with friends you could put this on but I'd just watch something better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":44942,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-04-19","keywords":"ghost,spin off,folklore,social worker,widow","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3663903257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjYwZTJiYTktM2E0NC00ZjJjLWFmYmYtYjZmM2ZlOTdjNzI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjYwZTJiYTktM2E0NC00ZjJjLWFmYmYtYjZmM2ZlOTdjNzI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother suspected of child endangerment, a social worker and her own children are drawn into a frightening supernatural realm.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004802/","name":"Linda Cardellini","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190441/","name":"Raymond Cruz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0892383/","name":"Patricia Velasquez"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980431/","name":"Michael Chaves"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5657522/","name":"Mikki Daughtry","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3037068/","name":"Tobias Iaconis"],"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Blackbird
Bez pożegnania
Blackbird
programme.desc:
Blackbird: Directed by Roger Michell. With Sam Neill, Susan Sarandon, Anson Boon, Kate Winslet. A terminally ill mother arranges to bring her family together one last time before she dies. A remake of the 2014 Danish film 'Silent Heart'." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8717446/","name":"Blackbird","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk1OTQ5MjAtNzM5Ny00YTFhLWJiNzYtMjZhNWZmMGU0M2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDExMzMxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A terminally ill mother arranges to bring her family together one last time before she dies. A remake of the 2014 Danish film 'Silent Heart'.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8717446/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ferguson-6"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"saying goodbye","reviewBody":"Greetings again from the darkness. Even though death is imminent for each of us, we don't all get the opportunity to say goodbye to loved ones. For those who do, it may not go as smoothly as they'd imagined. This is especially true if they are choosing to end things on their own terms due to a terminal illness. Roger Michell (NOTTING HILL, 1999; VENUS, 2006) directs this remake of the 2014 Danish film SILENT HEART (directed by Bille August), both written by Christian Torpe.

Family matriarch Lily (Oscar winner Susan Sarandon) has a terminal illness, and has arranged for the family to return home for one final get-together. See, Lily, with the assistance of her doting doctor husband Paul (Sam Neill) is planning to 'go' on her own terms, while it's still physically possible for her to take the medicinal potion. "Death with dignity", or euthanasia, is becoming a more frequent topic in films and conversation, despite still being illegal in most states. Of course, the legal and moral questions are heavily debated, but when it's a family member, it's the emotions that heat up.

First to arrive is eldest daughter Jennifer (Oscar winner Kate Winslet) and her husband Michael (Rainn Wilson, "The Office") and their son Jonathan (Anson Boon, CRAWL). Kate is the uptight, demanding type who is always judging others - including her nerdy well-meaning husband, and her free-spirited son. The younger daughter Anna (Mia Wasikowska) arrives with her partner Chris (Bex Taylor-Klaus, "The Killing"), and it's immediately clear that Jennifer and Anna are personality opposites (with some baggage), and that Anna is carrying an unspoken burden. Last to arrive is long-time family friend Liz (Lindsay Duncan), who is so close to Lily and Paul, that the family photographs show her on many family vacations and events over the years.

This has the look and feel of a stage presentation, as most of the scenes are filled with dialogue and occur within the confines of the stunning east coast home, apparently designed by Lily. There is a family walk along the beach and dunes, but most of the run time is filled with interpersonal interactions - some pleasant, some not pleasant at all. In fact, an early (by a couple of months) Christmas family dinner is sprinkled with pot smoking and emotional outbursts. It turns out, not surprisingly, that some of the secrets previously kept, find their way out into the open causing a few bumps in Lily's farewell weekend.

The complexities of family dynamics are amplified in this situation. Who is ready and who isn't, and why, becomes a topic of multiple discussions. We never really learn the meaning of the film's title, but we do enjoy the work of so many fine actors. You might recall Susan Sarandon played a dying woman more than 20 years ago in STEPMOM (1998), and this movie blends two memorable and recent films: FRANKIE with Isabelle Huppert, and HERE AWHILE with Anna Camp. Saying goodbye is never easy, but it sure beats missing the chance.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3640,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","keywords":"euthanasia,family gathering,terminal illness,assisted suicide,remake","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi912113177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI3MGQyYTEtOTI2MS00MTg5LTk0MTItMDlkMjMyOGYzMDZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI3MGQyYTEtOTI2MS00MTg5LTk0MTItMDlkMjMyOGYzMDZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Lily (Susan Sarandon) and Paul (Sam Neill) summon their loved ones to their beach house for one final gathering after Lily decides to end her long lbattle with ALS. The couple is planning a loving weekend complete with holiday traditions, but the mood becomes strained when unresolved issues surface between Lily and her daughters Jennifer (Kate Winslet) and Anna (Mia Wasikowska). Joining the collective farewell are Lily’s son in law (Rainn Wilson), her lifelong friend (Lindsay Duncan), daughter’s partner (Bex Taylor-Klaus) and grandson (Anson Boon). Her story is ultimately one of hope, love and a celebration of life."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000554/","name":"Sam Neill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000215/","name":"Susan Sarandon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6978918/","name":"Anson Boon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0585011/","name":"Roger Michell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0403784/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147213/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0646497/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1311535/","name":"Christian Torpe"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lorelei
Lorelei
programme.desc:
Lorelei: Directed by Sabrina Doyle. With Jena Malone, Pablo Schreiber, Ryan Findley, Cory Ellis. A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6461318/","name":"Lorelei","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY4ZGM4MWEtOTYxMC00OWE4LTllNWMtYzNjNWIxMTFlYjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg4MDY0MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6461318/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marcnieden"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"As realistic as it gets","reviewBody":"This is not some sort of action-genre nor is it an edge-of-seat thriller. However, this movie gives a brutal insight into some meaningless and worthless lives, of which plenty exists in our world. It is wonderfully played and directed, while the storyline sticks to the real stigma of low-life, survival, and struggle.

Why am I writing this? I was only 17-years old when I was desperate to escape a wretched child and youthhood. Back then, I met a woman who made me feel comfortable, loved an understood; never mind she was 6 years my senior and was mother to three children from her first marriage. I fell for her - and failed but struggled on for an unbelievable 45 years.

If some state here that this movie is nothing more than a 'wandering tale', than I dare to argue that that is what life is. Life is not fixed, nor does it proceed steadily. There are always difficulties, arguments, disagreements, and struggles. Even more so when people hit the lows and must live with little or no prospects. However, life can get compelling and testing when relationships evolve that have not much hope from the outset.

This movie leads the viewer in a very realistic surround of financial and relational struggles. To intensify the story, Weyland (Pablo) plays a character who was just released from prison after 15 years, meaning he would have had no real prospects of getting a fair chance or a decent job. Indeed, that gives the story another edge while leading the viewer in a world, 'normal' people cannot relate to.

Overall, it is a movie worth watching. It may seem boring for some, but others may find some resemblances to their own lives, past or present. The actors played their roles well and realistic, while I give credit to the director for packing so much real-life' into a small movie.

I really did enjoy and digest this great story.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":997,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-30","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1980416025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAwNDEyMGItNGRjZi00OTQwLTk1NTEtMDViMWFhNzI0M2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAwNDEyMGItNGRjZi00OTQwLTk1NTEtMDViMWFhNzI0M2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After 15 years in prison, Wayland (Pablo Schreiber) reunites with his high school girlfriend, Dolores (Jena Malone), who is now a single mother of three. What follows is a lyrical take on love, regret and second chances."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0540441/","name":"Jena Malone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1032567/","name":"Pablo Schreiber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277547/","name":"Ryan Findley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1397734/","name":"Sabrina Doyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0362036/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1397734/","name":"Sabrina Doyle"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6461318, Title: Lorelei, --- Description: Lorelei: Directed by Sabrina Doyle. With Jena Malone, Pablo Schreiber, Ryan Findley, Cory Ellis. A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6461318/","name":"Lorelei","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY4ZGM4MWEtOTYxMC00OWE4LTllNWMtYzNjNWIxMTFlYjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg4MDY0MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6461318/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"marcnieden","dateCreated":"2021-07-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"As realistic as it gets","reviewBody":"This is not some sort of action-genre nor is it an edge-of-seat thriller. However, this movie gives a brutal insight into some meaningless and worthless lives, of which plenty exists in our world. It is wonderfully played and directed, while the storyline sticks to the real stigma of low-life, survival, and struggle.

Why am I writing this? I was only 17-years old when I was desperate to escape a wretched child and youthhood. Back then, I met a woman who made me feel comfortable, loved an understood; never mind she was 6 years my senior and was mother to three children from her first marriage. I fell for her - and failed but struggled on for an unbelievable 45 years.

If some state here that this movie is nothing more than a 'wandering tale', than I dare to argue that that is what life is. Life is not fixed, nor does it proceed steadily. There are always difficulties, arguments, disagreements, and struggles. Even more so when people hit the lows and must live with little or no prospects. However, life can get compelling and testing when relationships evolve that have not much hope from the outset.

This movie leads the viewer in a very realistic surround of financial and relational struggles. To intensify the story, Weyland (Pablo) plays a character who was just released from prison after 15 years, meaning he would have had no real prospects of getting a fair chance or a decent job. Indeed, that gives the story another edge while leading the viewer in a world, 'normal' people cannot relate to.

Overall, it is a movie worth watching. It may seem boring for some, but others may find some resemblances to their own lives, past or present. The actors played their roles well and realistic, while I give credit to the director for packing so much real-life' into a small movie.

I really did enjoy and digest this great story.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":997,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-30","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1980416025","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAwNDEyMGItNGRjZi00OTQwLTk1NTEtMDViMWFhNzI0M2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAwNDEyMGItNGRjZi00OTQwLTk1NTEtMDViMWFhNzI0M2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After 15 years in prison, Wayland (Pablo Schreiber) reunites with his high school girlfriend, Dolores (Jena Malone), who is now a single mother of three. Ceniza Negra
programme.desc:
Ceniza negra: Directed by Sofía Quirós. With Smashleen Gutiérrez, Humberto Samuels, Hortensia Smith, Keha Brown. Selva (13) lives in a coastal town in the Caribbean. After the sudden disappearance of her only motherly figure, she is left to take care of her grandfather who doesn't want to live. Between shadows and wild games, she must decide if she will help her grandfather die, even though that means going through her last moments of childhood alone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10219406/","name":"Ceniza negra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjZkMjMwODctMDQ3Zi00MjkxLTgwNDYtNDM0MzY2NjMyZDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MTEzMTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Selva (13) lives in a coastal town in the Caribbean. After the sudden disappearance of her only motherly figure, she is left to take care of her grandfather who doesn't want to live. Between shadows and wild games, she must decide if","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10219406/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"morrison-dylan-fan"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":""Dying is like sleeping,a deep sleep-you fall asleep forever,and never wake up."","reviewBody":"After viewing the interesting Sanctorum (2019-also reviewed),I decided to check what other titles were on the 2021 WOW Film Festival line-up. Finding that there were only a handful of tickets left for this screening/stream,I got set to enter the land of ashes.

Note:Some plot details in review.

View on the film:

Becoming the first movie from Costa Rica to be shown at Cannes, debut writer/ director Sofia Quiros & cinematographer Francisca Saez Agurto explore the land of ashes with magnetic surrealist stylisation of refined wide-shots across 13 year old Selva and her grandparents holiday home, housed in panning shots between the living and the dead.

Slithering snakes onto the screen from the opening shot as a recurring motif/ symbol for eternal cyclic renewal or a cycle of life, death, and rebirth, (in this case,via shedding its own skin) Quiros marks the disappearance of Selva's grandmother, with an increase slide into Magical Realism,via excellent panning shots across the wall on the shadow of Selva talking to the shadow spirit/ghost of her grandmother.

With the rather dream-logic, abstract sparse dialogue screenplay by Quiros exploring Selva's relationship with death, Smashleen Gutierrez gives a mesmerising turn as Selva,whose sometimes abrasive exchanges with her grandparents,is shredded by Gutierrez with a growing spiritual maturity in the land of the ashes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-03-04","keywords":"mourning,coming of age","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1581039897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5OGM5ZDYtMjJmMC00ZmI3LTkzMGEtZDNiMjE3NzcxOTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5OGM5ZDYtMjJmMC00ZmI3LTkzMGEtZDNiMjE3NzcxOTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8681763/","name":"Smashleen Gutiérrez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10636144/","name":"Humberto Samuels"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10636145/","name":"Hortensia Smith"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4942492/","name":"Sofía Quirós"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0595748/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0590792/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0743073/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4942492/","name":"Sofía Quirós"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Saint Frances
Święta Frances
Saint Frances
programme.desc:
Saint Frances: Directed by Alex Thompson. With Kelly O'Sullivan, Ramona Edith Williams, Charin Alvarez, Lily Mojekwu. After an accidental pregnancy turned abortion, a deadbeat nanny finds an unlikely friendship with the six-year old she's charged with protecting." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9016016/","name":"Saint Frances","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFkODE5NjctZjc1Ni00OTIwLWFjYjAtZTU2MDFkZDI1NmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ0NzcxNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After an accidental pregnancy turned abortion, a deadbeat nanny finds an unlikely friendship with the six-year old she's charged with protecting.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9016016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markgorman"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lovely. But powerful with it.","reviewBody":"A great way to kick of 2021 was to watch one of Mark Kermode's top 10 of 2020 on Netflix.

This lovely American Indie movie, Saint Frances, written by and starring Kelly O'Sullivan. Nope, me neither.

It's the story of a 30 something 'girl' who's pretty much failed in life so far, who simultaneously gets a new boyfriend who gets her pregnant but is happy with her undertaking a quick abortion (and go halfers on the fee), and lands a summer job as a nanny for a six year old kid who has mixed race lesbian parents.

The kid's a brat and is running through nannies.

So you know how this all gonna pan out right?

Well, not really. What we embark on is a fairly, but not overly, emotional study in female empowerment (and actually entitlement because one of the moms is a pretty high achieving ball buster), loneliness, self-worth and social value.

The one guy in the movie isn't cast asunder as unimportant but he plays a side role. He's a good guy actually.

The four-way Mom, mom, nanny, kid (and a new baby which makes suppressed Mom, depressed Mom) dynamic is complicated and rarely sees the main protagonist played by O'Sullivan in a position of strength. Meanwhile her abortion has some fairly gross out complications although none that derail the narrative.

It's actually a bit of a comedy but it's a lot more than that. It's certainly bittersweet, but sweet enough.

Hugely thought provoking with several powerful central performances, a strong exploration of issues that face women today (one critic said it was too woke for its own good but I disagree) and a few really good laughs along the way.

What's not to love?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4077,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-28","keywords":"pregnancy,abortion,nanny,beach,depression","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saint Frances","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3730882329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzBlMWM3ZTktNjQ5My00YzFjLTk0MjEtNjI3ZTZmM2U3MmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzBlMWM3ZTktNjQ5My00YzFjLTk0MjEtNjI3ZTZmM2U3MmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3643779/","name":"Kelly O'Sullivan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10130595/","name":"Ramona Edith Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2725075/","name":"Charin Alvarez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3930165/","name":"Alex Thompson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0460856/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0538483/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3643779/","name":"Kelly O'Sullivan"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Goło i wesoło
The Full Monty
programme.desc:
The Full Monty: Directed by Peter Cattaneo. With Robert Carlyle, Mark Addy, Wim Snape, Steve Huison. Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119164/","name":"The Full Monty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg0NWFjMTAtNGZjMC00NmZlLThhZDYtM2MzNTU2NDZiZDVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDUyOTUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119164/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"artistathome"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is an unbeatable movie! I saw it at the theater in 1997 along with about 7 other women...we all went to the theater alone because our hubbies refused to take us! Seriously...I did not know one single woman in the theater that day! We all loved the movie right off...

My sister bought it and we watched it with captioning, and boy had we missed a lot of lines at the theater and funny ones at that! You see with the English accents and all their slang-- you just can't understand a lot of what they are saying...

Watch this movie with and without the captioning! It's like watching a movie with English being your second language, and I B.S. you not!

The English working class has a different way of expressing themselves--its so charming and hilarious...

I think Robert Carlysle is brilliant "Gaz". I cannot think of anyone who could have done it better. 

This movie cannot be beat! I bought it and recommend it to everyone!! The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119164/","name":"The Full Monty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg0NWFjMTAtNGZjMC00NmZlLThhZDYtM2MzNTU2NDZiZDVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDUyOTUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119164/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"artistathome","dateCreated":"2006-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is an unbeatable movie! I saw it at the theater in 1997 along with about 7 other women...we all went to the theater alone because our hubbies refused to take us! Seriously...I did not know one single woman in the theater that day! We all loved the movie right off...

My sister bought it and we watched it with captioning, and boy had we missed a lot of lines at the theater and funny ones at that! You see with the English accents and all their slang-- you just can't understand a lot of what they are saying...

Watch this movie with and without the captioning! It's like watching a movie with English being your second language, and I B.S. you not!

The English working class has a different way of expressing themselves--its so charming and hilarious...

I think Robert Carlysle is brilliant "Gaz". I cannot think of anyone who could have done it better. 

This movie cannot be beat! I bought it and recommend it to everyone!! Definitely a ten out of ten.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":102446,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-08-29","keywords":"steel worker,unemployment,male stripper,northern england,dole","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Full Monty","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi395116825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001015/","name":"Robert Carlyle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146341/","name":"Peter Cattaneo"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065001/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

It's really paint by numbers. Like you could fill them sentences in with so many different horror movie 'monsters/ghosts'.

I really like Linda Cardellini, she was fine in this nothing great.

programme.title: Bones
Bones
Kości
Bones
programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent="

The Equalizer
programme.desc:
The Equalizer: Created by Andrew W. Marlowe, Terri Edda Miller. With Queen Latifah, Tory Kittles, Adam Goldberg, Lorraine Toussaint. An enigmatic figure who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt11242246/","name":"The Equalizer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3MTgwYWUtMTc2NC00ZDdmLWIyNDAtOGJkNTQyZjM0NDA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An enigmatic figure who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11242246/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fredwmeyer2"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This series is all "Tell, Don't Show"... and that's the problem.","reviewBody":"The concept of "show, don't tell" was completely lost on the writers room. Every character had to describe every other character as "the best of the best", "the best the agency ever had", "the best I've ever seen".

If you have to tell your audience someone is the best, then they are probably not. The writers are just getting in their own way with excessive dialogue when some simple staging would allow viewers to come to their own conclusions., Instead, we're being TOLD everything.

Also, Queen Latifah is a good actress. She is, however, remarkably miscast in this series. The writers aren't writing to her strengths-- rock solid persona and strong delivery. Instead, they're trying to portray her as a seasoned fighter and are putting her in scenes where she's shown being physically violent. Those scenes fall flat due to the excessive jump cuts needed to compensate for the actress' lack of natural physicality. The classic 80's series did this well-- writing for McCall as a seasoned veteran in his late 50's vs. a modern spec ops warrior. As such, the original McCall used intimidation more than direct physical violence as his key weapon.

This series could be saved but it needs some heavy reworking. Right now it feels like "Equalizer in Name Only". Branding this as a remake of the original series is a disservice to all involved. Instead, create a brand new character for your very talented lead and stop trying to retread the past.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8316,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-02-07","keywords":"justice,fighter,woman warrior,action heroine,one woman army","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0457796/","name":"Tory Kittles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004965/","name":"Adam Goldberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110950/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0448397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0549256/","name":"Andrew W. Marlowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0589410/","name":"Terri Edda Miller"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Superbowl 2021 Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1113178393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU1MTlhY2ItNWVjZC00MzI2LWIzYWEtNDYxYjkyY2Y0ZTliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU1MTlhY2ItNWVjZC00MzI2LWIzYWEtNDYxYjkyY2Y0ZTliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the series premiere of The Equalizer airing after Super Bowl LV on CBS, Academy Award nominee and multi-hyphenate Queen Latifah stars as Robyn McCall, an enigmatic former CIA operative who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn.

Watch all-new episodes of The Equalizer on Sundays at 8/7c on CBS and CBS All Access."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0455944, Title: The Equalizer, --- Description: The Equalizer: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Denzel Washington, Marton Csokas, Chloë Grace Moretz, David Harbour. A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455944/","name":"The Equalizer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MzE2NTk0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM3NTk1MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455944/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mjacksongta","dateCreated":"2015-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Home Depot EQUALS a bad place to be while on Robert McCall's bad side","reviewBody":"In terms of an action movie I gave the equalizer a 7 but soon after felt the need to watch it again and then upped it to an 8. Why? We'll it's an action movie but yet there's no crazy car chases, there's no bombs or heavy big explosions every where. Really the only action scenes are the fight scenes and even they don't come that often. But when they do come they deliver. Denzel is as awesome as ever in these scenes and the creativity in these scenes are what sets it apart from every other action movie. The main character Robert McCall in an ex specialist of some sort, you don't know what at first but know that he's highly trained in something and is now working as an ordinary man working at Home Depot or home Mart as it is in the movie. He looks like just your every day man but can kill you with just about any everyday weapon. And he does this so calmly that big crazy car scenes and explosions would rake away from his character. A man that takes the bus to come kill a whole gang is pretty bad ass by any standard. \n\nAs always I don't want to give spoilers but I do recommend this as a good wholesome action movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":350274,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-09-26","keywords":"vigilante,prostitute,mysterious past,gangster,ex soldier","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1649060889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NzQyMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NzQyMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former black ops commando who faked his death for a quiet life in Boston comes out of his retirement to rescue a young girl and finds himself face to face with Russian gangsters.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631269/","name":"Chloë Grace Moretz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0921013/","name":"Richard Wenk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0805994/","name":"Michael Sloan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2030456/","name":"Richard Lindheim"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
The Resident: Created by Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, Roshan Sethi. With Matt Czuchry, Manish Dayal, Bruce Greenwood, Emily VanCamp. A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6483832/","name":"The Resident","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1MmE1NGYtMzFlYS00YTNmLThjNmEtMjQ5NzY4NmJkZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMzcxOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fatelovesthefearless"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for yourself! It's not bad!","reviewBody":"It's not the greatest medical drama and does not compare to ER as far as realism goes but as a nurse most of the medical stuff is correct and every show gets stuff wrong so don't not like a medical show because it's not 100% accurate. 

I like that they have taken this show on from a different angle - money and corruption! I don't live in the USA but I imagine this is actually quite accurate in the way hospitals are run and that it is all about money and not necessarily doing what's best for the patient. 

The characters so far are interesting - I'm 7 episodes in and I like that some patients are in it for longer than an episode. There are characters you want to root for the do gooders and there are characters you love to hate who are selfish, rich and really in the wrong business. Oh and there's a main character that's a nurse which is always a plus since we basically make the hospitals run! 

So if you like medical dramas give it a go! I've seen them all - ER is the best, I've got a soft spot for Greys Anatomy even though sometimes it's ridiculous m, Code Black is great, Chicago Med is alright, The night shift was good. They are all entertaining so in my mind they do what they are suppose to!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21065,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. Charming, arrogant and only a third-year resident, Conrad does everything in the most unconventional way possible."}}</script><metacontent="

It's not bad!","reviewBody":"It's not the greatest medical drama and does not compare to ER as far as realism goes but as a nurse most of the medical stuff is correct and every show gets stuff wrong so don't not like a medical show because it's not 100% accurate. 

I like that they have taken this show on from a different angle - money and corruption! I don't live in the USA but I imagine this is actually quite accurate in the way hospitals are run and that it is all about money and not necessarily doing what's best for the patient. 

The characters so far are interesting - I'm 7 episodes in and I like that some patients are in it for longer than an episode. There are characters you want to root for the do gooders and there are characters you love to hate who are selfish, rich and really in the wrong business. Oh and there's a main character that's a nurse which is always a plus since we basically make the hospitals run! 

So if you like medical dramas give it a go! I've seen them all - ER is the best, I've got a soft spot for Greys Anatomy even though sometimes it's ridiculous m, Code Black is great, Chicago Med is alright, The night shift was good. They are all entertaining so in my mind they do what they are suppose to!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21065,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. programme.title: Furious 6
Szybcy i wściekli 6
Furious 6
programme.desc:
Furious 6: Directed by Justin Lin. With Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jordana Brewster. Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1905041/","name":"Furious 6","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NTg2NDQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc2NzQzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1905041/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaClown"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Builds Upon The Winning Blockbuster Formula Of Fast Five.","reviewBody":"The sixth instalment in The Fast and the Furious franchise, Fast & Furious 6 follows into the footsteps of its predecessor and continues the series' new-found mantra of departing from its original street racing theme to move further into the heist thriller sub-genre. And even if it's not as refreshing & impressive as Fast Five, it nonetheless succeeds as another thrilling, ridiculously entertaining & undeniably fun extravaganza.

The story of Fast & Furious 6 concerns Dominic Toretto & his crew, all of whom have retired to a comfortable life following the heist they pulled off in the previous chapter yet they still remain wanted fugitives in their homeland. But when Hobbs asks for their services to take down a skilled mercenary organisation in exchange for clearing their criminal records, Dom accepts the deal and reassembles his team to finish one last job.

Directed by Justin Lin, Fast & Furious 6 is his final stint with this franchise and he decides to go out on a high note by delivering a picture that's far too enjoyable to worry about the laws of physics being bent here on few occasions. The screenplay packs in an interesting plot filled with excellent use of humour but it isn't as tightly gripped as the last instalment and is a slight step down in comparison. But a few elements do get an upgrade.

The technical aspects follow the same formula that was applied in Fast Five and there isn't much to complain here for the set pieces look spectacularly detailed, the action sequences benefit a lot from its energetic camera-work, brilliant editing & more use of practical effects just like the last chapter although at times the action goes way too over-the-top yet not so exaggerated for most viewers to suspend disbelief. And the background score is fitting for the most part.

Coming to the performances, the entire main cast that was present in the last one reprises its role, Michelle Rodrigues also returns to join the gang and Luke Evans is the new addition who plays this chapter's antagonist. Vin Diesel & Paul Walker do their usual best as Toretto & O'Conner, Dwayne Johnson continues to impress as Hobbs, However, Evans doesn't get enough screen time to show his mettle and his characters turns out to be a generic villain. The rest of the cast chips in with fine contributions.

On an overall scale, Fast & Furious 6 builds upon the very ingredients that worked in favour of Fast Five and, barring a couple of issues, manages to stay on the track for the most part. Although not as amazing as the previous entry, this is nevertheless an immensely enjoyable blockbuster material that promises a lot of fun & thrills, and effectively delivers it. Definitely more style than substance although the margin isn't as vast as it had been in the first four chapters of this franchise, Fast & Furious 6 comes delightfully recommended."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":381081,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-05-22","keywords":"canary islands,reference to spain,reference to the incredible hulk,humvee,brian o'conner character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3225003545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":" Agent Hobbs enlists the aid of Dom and team to help bring a rival gang, led by Owen Shaw, to justice. In exchange for clear records, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604555/","name":"Chris Morgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860155/","name":"Gary Scott Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

Bones
programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
Na skraju jutra
Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Edge of Tomorrow: Directed by Doug Liman. With Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt, Brendan Gleeson, Bill Paxton. A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1631867/","name":"Edge of Tomorrow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5OTk4MTM3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODcxNjg3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1631867/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CalRhys"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Summer Blockbuster Not To Be Missed","reviewBody":"One of the most ingenious film concepts ever created, a cross between 'Saving Private Ryan' and 'Groundhog Day', 'Edge of Tomorrow' is a gripping and clever blockbuster sci-fi thrill-ride accompanied with taut, fast-paced action and compelling direction. Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt form a perfect chemistry that takes them from the training ground, to the battlefield through to the action-bound finale in Paris. The premise of the time-loop has been used many times before, but this time round there are enough exciting visuals and dynamic storytelling skills employed to make this one thrilling (and unexpectedly comedic) flick that is unpredictable and expertly designed. A model of cinematic craftsmanship."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":629654,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2014-06-04","keywords":"time loop,alien,dying repeatedly,combat,end of the world","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"IMAX Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3591679257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0Mjk4MTI0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQyNjE4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0Mjk4MTI0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQyNjE4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A soldier fighting in a war with aliens finds himself caught in a time loop of his last day in the battle, though he becomes better skilled along the way.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1289434/","name":"Emily Blunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0449458/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3890871/","name":"John-Henry Butterworth"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Phone Booth
Telefon
Phone Booth
programme.desc:
Phone Booth: Directed by Joel Schumacher. With Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Forest Whitaker, Radha Mitchell. Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183649/","name":"Phone Booth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxNDQ5MzAyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjkxMTU3._V1_.jpg","description":"Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183649/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bostonboy"},"dateCreated":"2005-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining and full of suspense!","reviewBody":"This is the kind of movie that is rare these days. It didn't cost an arm and a leg to make, it stars some good actors and the story line was plausible.

The Hitchcock influence is obvious and the pacing of the film was just right. This is the best work of director Schumacher. The lead could have been played by any yuppie looking actor but Colin Farrell does a good job anyway in a role that puts you in his character's place.

It's hard to make a movie work when it takes place in a confined space with few characters, but when those movies succeed, it shows. And that's how it is with "Phone Booth."","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":258880,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-06-11","keywords":"single set production,psychopath,phone booth,sniper,hostage","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Phone Booth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi932970777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJkN2QxODUtN2Q2OS00OGE1LTk2ZjgtM2ExYjcyMTJlMDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJkN2QxODUtN2Q2OS00OGE1LTk2ZjgtM2ExYjcyMTJlMDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001845/","name":"Forest Whitaker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001708/","name":"Joel Schumacher"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150494/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169540/","name":"Larry Cohen"}],"duration":"PT1H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Frankie Go Boom
3, 2, 1... Frankie w sieci
Frankie Go Boom
programme.desc:
Frankie Go Boom: Directed by Jordan Roberts. With Charlie Hunnam, Nora Dunn, Sam Anderson, Chris O'Dowd. Frank Bartlett has been tortured, embarrassed, and humiliated by his brother Bruce -- usually on film -- his entire life. Now that Bruce is finally off drugs and has turned his life around, things should be different. They are not." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1772271/","name":"Frankie Go Boom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE5MDlmODAtYzYwNS00ZDczLWE2YmUtNWVhOTg0YTVlNTBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODEwMTc2ODQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Frank Bartlett has been tortured, embarrassed, and humiliated by his brother Bruce -- usually on film -- his entire life. Now that Bruce is finally off drugs and has turned his life around, things should be different. They are not.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1772271/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thepotatoHasEyes"},"dateCreated":"2013-04-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"decide for yourself-it is a different kind of humor-overall it IS a comedy","reviewBody":"Frankie goes boom, sometimes , to me , seems too "real" to be funny, but at that same moment , it makes you laugh, ...so, ...hard to describe, 

It has a real "grittiness" to the humor,...I kept saying to myself, this is not going to be funny"...and then finding myself laughing ...

I am on my third watching, so it has my "re watcher" stamp, but still that feeling remains. 

"franky goes boom' has the ability to make you uncomfortable, it also has the ability to make you laugh... 

I definitely recommend "franky" as a comedy , but you REALLY need to have a sense of humor--if not , you wont enjoy.
